#################################################

System Requirements:
Operating System : Windows XP or Vista
Keyboard and Mouse : Supported
Processor : Pentium 2 - 350MHz or better
RAM : 128MB
DirectX Version : 7.0 or above

#################################################

How to install:
1. Run Dragon Ball-setup.exe
2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

Can you help the darling and courageous dragon family regain their family's magic pearl? Many years ago, this close-knit clan was banished to remote islands and now they need your help in reclaiming what's rightfully theirs! Help little Manga Dragon find the family's lost pearl and more importantly their power; succeed in the mission and their destiny will forever be changed because of your bravery and skill.
